          <title>
            <string language="en">Faith Is .  </string>
            <string language="es">La fe es.  </string>
            <string language="ga">Is éard is Creideamh ann..  </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glaube Ist.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Foi Est.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Fé É.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Fede È.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η πίστη είναι.</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Worksheet exploring different statements on the meaning of faith.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo que explora diferentes declaraciones sobre el significado de la fe.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre a fhiosraíonn ráitis ar chéard is creideamh ann.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religious Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación religiosa. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Oideachas Reiligiúnach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Billeog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen, der unterschiedliche Anweisungen auf der Bedeutung 
des Glaubens erforscht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau explorant différents rapports sur la 
signification de la foi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha que explora indicações diferentes no meaning da 
fé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro che esplora le istruzione differenti sul 
significato della fede.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας που ερευνά τις διαφορετικές δηλώσεις 
στην έννοια της πίστης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religionserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
